## Calibration Procedure

### Environmental Conditions

| Parameter | Value | Acceptable Range |
|-----------|-------|------------------|
| Ambient Temperature | °C | 15-30°C |
| Humidity | % RH | < 80% |
| Atmospheric Pressure | mbar | |

### Calibration Steps

**Step 1: Zero/Neutral Point**

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| Standard Used | |
| Standard Value | |
| Raw ADC Reading | |
| Displayed Value Before | |
| Adjustment Made | |
| Displayed Value After | |
| Stabilization Time | seconds |

**Step 2: Span Point**

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| Standard Used | |
| Standard Value | |
| Raw ADC Reading | |
| Displayed Value Before | |
| Adjustment Made | |
| Displayed Value After | |
| Stabilization Time | seconds |

**Step 3: Verification Point (if applicable)**

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| Standard Used | |
| Standard Value | |
| Displayed Value | |
| Error | |
